data.title: Abalone
data.author: OKaria-04
data.feature:
In water, sound propagates in the same way as in air, but we are only able to hear 10% of the sounds that occur underwater; there the vibrating layers, made up of water molecules, transmit the disturbance to almost 5 times faster speed.Abalone uses echolocation with the operation of an active sonar; a sound is emitted that bounces when it encounters an obstacle and analyzes the echo received. It thus achieves knowing the distance to the objects, measuring the delay time between the signal it has emitted and the one it has received. this helps people in cloudy water or visually impaired to get a clear picture of their surroundings underwater
Its name are inspired by the marine gastropod of the genus Haliotis, also known as sea ear.it is composed of hydrophones located on the sides that capture the wave; gills that trap the O2 dissolved in the water to provide oxygen;and a water-based electromagnetic grid which is a mesh of ice at normal temperature ; based on Professor Unabara's study

data.title: Sound-Stinger
data.author: Bogim
data.feature: This device emits sound waves that alarm marine creatures. It can be used in places where is a lot of dangerous, toxic trash in the water. Until the water is cleared, animals wont enter the area, so they wont be in danger. The item must be installed by drilling into the ground, a sharp edge is available for this purpose. The device emits a weak light so that it can be easily found later. They come in different lengths and sizes depending on the area to be fenced.

data.title: Moon Catcher
data.feature:
"Moon Catcher"
L 5cm x W 5cm x H 10cm / 65g
A device imitated by a jellyfish.
Can be connected to a hunter's communication device, capture or track targets through built-in programs, mostly used to collect non-aggressive marine life samples.

data.title: 大海原の弓
data.author: 紫暮
data.feature: 大海原の海流をイメージした弓矢で海洋生物『カジキ』をモチーフにしている。使用者の推進力、旋回性能を格段にアップさせる。矢に仕込まれた麻酔で刺さった獲物を瞬時に痺れさせる。

data.title: ドルフィンスーツ
data.author: 日出木陽太
data.feature: 単独での海洋生物調査用に開発された水中高速移動用スーツ。全身の可動部にパワーアシストシステムを採用。人間の筋力でもイルカ並みの遊泳力を発揮できる。スーツに搭載されている機能はすべて音声入力が可能。自動遊泳システムも搭載しており、音声入力だけでイルカのさまざまな挙動を再現することもできる。緊急時には登録されている地点まで自動で高速帰還が可能。また、鯨類が発する鳴音を解析・再現することができ、鯨類との簡単なコミュニケーションも可能である。両ヒレのグローブから手を内側に抜くことでスーツ内部でも両手を動かすことができるため、水中でのスーツ着用時でもかゆいところに手が届く仕様となっている。宇宙服と同様に着用時はオムツ必須。

data.title: MOBILE MARITIME RECYCLING AND MAPPING STATION the "Grabber"
data.author: Pepp's
@YeetsBoi
data.feature: The Bubble. A futuristic underwater cruise submarine that brings new kind of joy and experience!

data.title: Skeleton Spider Crab
data.author: Xkaly
data.feature:
Hidden beneath Arctic ice is a world few have ever seen, Blue hunters discovered an area like no other,
they called it "The freezing hell". The floor it's rich with natural radioactive materials, sea vents that expel toxic gases create a unique balance between freezing and burning and yet life finds a way.
The Skeleton spider crab starts its life as a really tiny creature, it obtains energy through the hydrothermal vents and bacteria in a process known as Chemosynthesis, eventually they grow large enough to hunt prey, and they keep growing more and more, scientist don´t know much about them since their habitat is difficult to access, but some theorize they can continue growing indefinitely in the deepest unexplored oceans.

data.title: セイレーンマキガイ
data.author: Yukio
data.feature:
・名前は巻貝だけどおそらく頭足類
・胸部の花のようなところが口
・人間の声に似た音が出る
・頑張ればインコやオウムぐらいはお話しできる

data.title: Fallobela
data.author: Yoav Cohen
data.feature:
(couldn't decide which design is better so I am doing both)
Species: Fallobella (fallo = deceive, bella = cute/charming in Latin)
Difficulty to capture: 3
Habitat: deep in the continental slope
Diet: carnivore
Body length: ~18m
Degree of endangerment: 4

data.title: 黄昏の洋上港
data.author: JOYNUS
data.feature: 陸地を離れ海が生活居住の場所となったとき、居住場所を確保する上でも、海上モビリティやその拠点となる港湾が先立って重要になると思いました。大量の資材や人の運搬、エネルギー源、また陸地を離れざるを得なかった状況、故郷への郷愁、などを思いながら描いてみました。見て下さった皆様の心に、少しでも印象を残すことができれば幸いです。

data.author: @margaretpalermo
data.feature: Blue Hunter (MediBang) Future Landscape / Architecture Category

data.author: @okamura1980
data.feature: 大きな海洋生物を生きたままスキャンする巨大レントゲン装置

data.title: Arina Море
data.author: niichii
data.feature:
名前：Arina Море（アンナ・モーリェ）
海をこよなく愛する女性。特殊な発声器官をもち人々や海の生物をリラックスさせる不思議な音波を発することができる。
彼女の歌声を聞くと狂暴だったり警戒心の強い深海生物も大人しくなるため、傷つけることなく保護することができる。そのためハンター協会では主に保護⼠として活躍している。
幼少期に出会ったサンゴの触角をはやした未知の深海生物に憧れを持っており、それを模したバウンティキットにマイＡＩを転送して常に連れ歩いている。
また、過酷な海での暮らしに疲れた人々を癒す歌姫としても活躍しており、海上ライブや海中ライブをよく行っている。

data.title: Namazu Kashima
data.author: OKaria-04
data.feature:
namazu is a shrewd hunter who from a very young age was under the control of an underworld mining group where she played the role of locator of mineral pits,in reality she never had a name "namazu" was the nickname she was given in her childhood,she has the anomaly of emitting sound waves capable of generating earthquakes;Her gloves can handle the wave emission safely;these waves can penetrate through certain objects and soft tissue,giving her a sort of X-ray view of the world around her.She used to spend days in the dark so developed excellent echolocation which qualifies her for low visibility missions.At some point she had an injury that required physical therapy,despite not needing it now she keeps using her equipment because out of habit she feels that is part of her.After the arrest of the team she belonged to, namazu was redeemed by the Kashima family who reformed her to this day to calm the ocean disturbances.
hunter class 2 rank16
Weight/height:168cm/58kg
nationality:unknown
